hero.title: Manage Your Warehouse with Ease
hero.subtitle: The most complete solution for stock management, multi-warehouse, and direct sales.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: Powerful features wrapped in a beautiful interface.

testimonials.title: Loved by Businesses
testimonials.subtitle: From distributors to manufacturers, Lumbung keeps operations lean and predictable.

budi.name: Budi Santoso

pricing.title: Simple Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs.

multiWarehouse.question: Can I manage multiple warehouses?
multiWarehouse.answer: Yes, our Pro and Enterprise plans fully support multi-warehouse management with transfer features.

trial.question: Is there a free trial?
trial.answer: Absolutely! You can try Lumbung free for 14 days, no credit card required.

export.question: Can I export my data?
export.answer: Yes, you can export all your inventory and sales data to CSV or Excel at any time.

cta.title: Ready to organize your warehouse?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses trusting Lumbung for their inventory management.

Pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the right plan for your business. No hidden fees.

mission.title: Empowering businesses to master their inventory.
mission.description: We believe warehouse management shouldn't be complicated. Our mission is to provide powerful, accessible tools that assist business growth.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.desc: We prioritize clean design and intuitive workflows over bloated features.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.desc: Your data is the backbone of your business. We treat it with utmost care.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: We constantly evolve to bring the latest technology to your warehouse.

2023.title: Inception
2023.desc: Lumbung was born out of frustration with clunky, expensive warehouse software.

2024.title: v1.0 Launch
2024.desc: We launched our MVP and secured our first 100 paying customers.

2025.title: Scaling Up
2025.desc: Released v2.0 with advanced analytics and AI features. Reached 1000+ users.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate individuals building the future of inventory management.

cta.title: Join our journey
cta.subtitle: We're always looking for talented people to join our team and businesses to partner with.
